mapper.select: select VISITOR_ID, PEOPLE_COUNT, VISITOR_NAME, VISIT_TIME, CREATE_TIME, PHONE_NUMBER, STATUS, VISITING_REASON, REMARK, ROOM_ID, USER_ID from VISITOR where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by CREATE_TIME desc
mapper.insert: insert into VISITOR (VISITOR_ID, PEOPLE_COUNT, VISITOR_NAME, VISIT_TIME, CREATE_TIME, PHONE_NUMBER, STATUS, VISITING_REASON, REMARK, ROOM_ID, USER_ID) values ( #{visitorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{peopleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{visitorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{visitingReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{room.roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
